name: 40dopbot
description: Telegram bot that sends daily prayer guides pulled from the 40 Days of Prayer website

scripts-info.createDynamoTables: Runs script to create the necessary DynamoDB tables on AWS. To be run once when setting up the AWS environment.
scripts-info.invokeScraper: Invokes the scraper AWS Lambda via serverless
scripts-info.invokeScheduler: Invokes the scheduler AWS Lambda via serverless
scripts-info.localScrape: Runs script to get and save today's HTML content
